Knowledge.description: Some destructible objects have vulnerabilities other than those which the player is informed of. For example, Power Bomb can be used to destroy Enkys or open charge beam doors. Enabling this trick may require players to apply this knowledge in order to progress.

Movement.description: A broad category for non-obvious movement which can't easily be classified using other tricks. Players may be expected to perform precise jumps and other niche movement optimizations.

Combat.description: If this trick is enabled, the player may be expected to defeat enemies and bosses with fewer items and less health.

Pseudo.description: It´s possible to fire through solid walls without obtaining wave beam.

IBJ.description: By chaining and timing bomb jumps it`s possible to reach the top of a room.

HBJ.description: Standing on a bomb while morphed will blast you in a certain direction. This also works midair.

WBJ.description: Performing a WBJ will make higher bomb jumps underwater possible. To setup a WBJ you need to bomb jump under water and demorph midair. If you now perform a bomb jump midair without touching the ground as morphball you´ll be blasted higher than normal.

WSJ.description: Used to gain height underwater in certain places without Gravity Suit.

SWJ.description: With this technique it is possible to jump up a single wall all the way up. You need morphball to execute it

Slide.description: By sliding off a cliff and jumping right before you fall you´ll jump further.

Speedbooster.description: Maintaining and chaining speedbooster through complex and otherwise unintended situations will be necessary

Walljump.description: Basic movement ability which can be abused in unintended ways.

SSC.description: Shinesparking and firing the grapple beam in certain locations allows you to clip through floors.

Suitless.description: You can run through heat and cold rooms without a suit. It depends on your health how long you can stay in these rooms.

RGrapple.description: Opening up grapple blocks from the "wrong" side is possible.

DBoost.description: Most enemies will knock you away when Samus gets damaged. This can be used to get momentum over ledges.

FrozenEnemy.description: After you receive the ice missiles you´ll be able to freeze some enemies in place allowing you to reach certain spots.

data.comment: TODO: Not enough space for speedbooster without short charges - account for this
Gain a little extra height in water without Gravity Suit by using a Bomb or Cross Bomb
